攙.definition: to take by the arm and assist; to mix; to blend; to dilute; to adulterate

攙假.definition: to dilute; to debase (by mixing with fake material)

攙兌.definition: to mix (different substances together); to blend

攙和.definition: to mix; to mingle; to interfere; to meddle

攙扶.definition: to lend an arm to support sb

攙雜.definition: to mix; to blend; to dilute
